servicePlans.name: standard
servicePlans.description: Digitize your sports performance and team management processes

default_timezone.description: Choose the preferred time zone for SAP Sports One.
default_timezone.title: Default Time Zone

email.description: With which email address do you want to log in to SAP Sports One? To benefit from single sign-on, you may want to use the same email address that you use to log in to other applications at your club or association.
email.title: Your Email Address
email.validationMessage: Please enter a valid email address.

heimspiel_id.description: To import match data from Heimspiel, enter your Heimspiel ID (a contract with Heimspiel is required in advance).
heimspiel_id.title: Heimspiel ID (data provider)
heimspiel_id.validationMessage: Please enter a valid Heimspiel ID.

import_language.description: Choose the language in which you want to see the Heimspiel match data.
import_language.title: Preferred Language of Heimspiel Data

user_id.description: Enter a user name. Depending on how you set up your club or association's identity provider, you may be able to log in to SAP Sports One with your User ID.
user_id.title: Create an SAP Sports One User ID
user_id.validationMessage: Please include an User ID with at least 4 characters and a maximun of 32 characters, whereby only capital letters and numbers are allowed.

default_timezone.description: Choose the preferred time zone for SAP Sports One.
default_timezone.title: Default Time Zone

email.validationMessage: Please enter a valid email address.
